name: chatery-whatsapp-monorepo
description: Chatery WhatsApp API with AI Assistant

scripts.dev: concurrently -n whatsapp,ai,dashboard -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:whatsapp" "npm run dev:ai" "npm run dev:dashboard"
scripts.start: npm run start -w @chatery/whatsapp-api & npm run start -w @chatery/ai-service
